name: Ocular AI
long_description: Ocular AI lets teams within organizations search, visualize, and perform critical cross tool actions all on one unified platform. Having worked at  Microsoft and Google we've experienced first-hand how difficult it is to access and find information across multiple Saas tools. To solve this, Ocular AI brings infrastructure, tooling, data, services together and facilitates knowledge discovery and actions all on one platform.
one_liner: The Open Core Enterprise Search and Generative AI Platform
